title: [Emberstone Hall, Atrium]
description: The manor opens up into a large circular chamber with a high glass dome ceiling.  A dark ironwood tree rises up from the center of the room, its branches bathed in sunlight from above.  Finely dressed servants bustle between a mahogany archway and a long hallway, while a wide stairwell ascends to the second floor.
room.location: Emberstone Hall, inside the island town of Mist Harbor
